Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game. Add a context menu to open someone's logs. Layout, style, stats, default metric, and more are all customizable in the settings.
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
- 2.1.6.0:
   Add an option to open the party view when using the context menu from a party list-related window.
   Add Tomestone option when opening a link.
   "Open With" will no longer open on private PFs.
   Use Dalamud's context menu.
   Some miscellaneous behind-the-scenes changes.
